item.description:
What's keeping you from that? This workshop is to motivate you to really live, be engaged, be purposeful or and enjoy and pursue your interests! Herb will talk about how to set up a daily support system to help you stay encouraged, how to balance your life, and be energized. So if you need some energy, show up!

Herb Pearce has been teaching workshops for 30 years. He's a therapist, personal coach and the author of 2 books, one on the Enneagram and also "Herb's Tips for Living."

Optional very tasty macrobiotic chef David Snieckus from 7 to 8:30 for an additional $20. Show up anytime during that time.
at Margaret/David's house
99 Crescent St., Newton MA

8:30 pm - 10:00 pm
($30 - Sliding scale to $15)
item.name: Be Fully Alive and Engaged in Your Life
